00031 class KeywordHandler {
00032   private:
00033     
00034     typedef struct KeySpec {
00035       KeySpec() : _name(""), _occurs(0) { }
00036       KeySpec(const std::string &name, int occurs = 0) : 
00037                                _name(name), _occurs(occurs) { }
00038 
00039       inline std::string name() const { return (_name); }
00040       inline int occurance() const { return (_occurs); }
00041 
00042       std::string _name;       
00043       int         _occurs;     
00044     };
00045 
00046     class PvlAggregate {
00047       public:
00048         PvlAggregate() : _spec(), _obj(0), _grp(0), _key(0) { }
00049         PvlAggregate(const KeySpec &kspec) : _spec(kspec),
00050                      _obj(0), _grp(0), _key(0) { }
00051         PvlAggregate(Isis::PvlObject *obj, int occurs = 0) : 
00052                      _spec(obj->Name(), occurs), _obj(obj), _grp(0), _key(0) { }
00053         PvlAggregate(Isis::PvlContainer *grp, int occurs = 0) : 
00054                      _spec(grp->Name(), occurs), _obj(0), _grp(grp), _key(0) { }
00055         PvlAggregate(Isis::PvlKeyword *key, int occurs = 0) : 
00056                      _spec(key->Name(), occurs), _obj(0), _grp(0), _key(key) { }
00057         ~PvlAggregate() { }
00058 
00059         inline std::string name() const { return (_spec._name); }
00060         inline bool isObject() const { return (_obj != 0);}
00061         inline bool isGroup() const { return (_grp != 0);}
00062         inline bool isKeyword() const { return (_key != 0); }
00063         inline bool isDefined() const { 
00064           return (isObject() || isGroup() || isKeyword());
00065         }
00066 
00067         inline Isis::PvlObject    *getObject()   const { return (_obj); }
00068         inline Isis::PvlContainer *getGroup()    const { return (_grp); }
00069         inline Isis::PvlKeyword   *getKeyword()  const { return (_key); }
00070         inline int                getOccurance() const { return (_spec._occurs); }
00071 
00072         void Release() {
00073           _obj = 0;
00074           _grp = 0;
00075           _key =  0;
00076           return;
00077         }
00078 
00079         void Destroy() {
00080           delete _obj; _obj = 0;
00081           delete _grp; _grp = 0;
00082           delete _key; _key = 0;
00083           return;
00084         }
00085 
00086       private:
00087         KeySpec            _spec;    
00088         Isis::PvlObject    *_obj;    
00089         Isis::PvlContainer *_grp;    
00090         Isis::PvlKeyword   *_key;    
00091     };
00092

00094      static const char* const ID;          
00095      typedef TNT::Array1D<short int>  Occurance;
00096      typedef enum { String, Double, Integer } KeyType;
00097      typedef enum { None, Keyword, Group, Object } AggregateType;

00148  template <class T> 
00149  bool KeywordHandler::Fetch(Isis::Pvl &pvl, TNT::Array1D<T> &vals) {
00150    if (!_kspec.empty()) {
00151      AggregateList alist;
00152      resolve(pvl, _kspec, alist);
00153      PvlAggregate last = alist.back();
00154      if (last.isKeyword()) {
00155        Isis::PvlKeyword *key = last.getKeyword();
00156        TNT::Array1D<T> v(key->Size());
00157        for (int i = 0 ; i < v.dim() ; i++) {
00158          v[i] = (T) (*key)[i];
00159        }
00160        vals = v;
00161        return (true);
00162      }
00163    }
00164    vals = TNT::Array1D<T>(0);
00165    return (false);
00166  }
00167 
00168  template <class T> 
00169  bool KeywordHandler::Fetch(Isis::Pvl &pvl, T &val, int nth) {
00170    if (!_kspec.empty()) {
00171      AggregateList alist;
00172      resolve(pvl, _kspec, alist);
00173      PvlAggregate last = alist.back();
00174      if (last.isKeyword()) {
00175        Isis::PvlKeyword *key = last.getKeyword();
00176        val = (T) (*key)[nth];
00177        return (true);
00178      }
00179    }
00180    return (false);
00181  }
